attributes.action: Back Boris leave on the 31st October 2019
attributes.additional_details:
The people made the vote To leave 3 years ago.And we have heard nothing else but Brexit since we are sick of hearing it.
just let us get out and get on with sorting out this Country and caring for our own rather than everyone else.
attributes.background: Stop MP’s going against Boris Johnson’s decision to suspend parliament. And going for a general election.
